analyzed: na iva kiṇāmi na api vikkiṇāmi

original: Na cāpi me sannicayo ca atthi;
analyzed: na ca api me sannicayaḥ ca atthi
ayam ca vaḥ sunakhaḥ kissa hetu

original: Akkhātha no brāhmaṇā ke nu tumhe”.
analyzed: akkhātha naḥ brāhmaṇā ke nu tumhe
cando ca suriyaḥ ca ubho idha āgatā
eso ca kho pañcasikho ti vuccati
ye keci ime mad śarinaḥ kadariyā
tvam na usi ñāti purimāsu jātisu
addhā hi mam vaḥ hita kāmā
na ca apiham kiñci kareyya pāpa
na ca api me kiñci adeyyam atthi
evam ca me dadataḥ sabba kāla
